subject: Critical Thinking
subcategory: Evidence & Truth: How We Know What's Real
title: Paradigm Shifts: When the Whole Framework Changes
description: Learn Paradigm Shifts: When the Whole Framework Changes in one minute.

hook.text: For 1,400 years, Earth was the center of the universe. Then Copernicus moved the Sun to the center. Same sky, new truth.

buildup.text: Thomas Kuhn: science doesn't progress smoothly.

discovery.text: A paradigm is a framework of assumptions. Normal science works within it. Anomalies pile up until the framework breaks.

twist.text: During a shift, old and new paradigms are 'incommensurable' â€” they don't share enough assumptions to compare directly.

climax.text: Copernicus, Darwin, Einstein, plate tectonics â€“ each required scientists to abandon deep assumptions, not just add.

punchline.text: Sometimes progress means changing the question, not the answer.

quiz.question: What is a paradigm shift according to Thomas Kuhn?
options: A revolutionary change in the fundamental framework of scientific assumptions
A political change in science funding
